content.question: Which of the following best describes the preconditions necessary for the method to run without error?

choices.label: The  ArrayList  must be sorted from smallest to largest.
The  ArrayList  must contain at least one element.
The  ArrayList  must contain at least two elements.
The  ArrayList  must contain only positive  Integer  values.

content.answer: The  ArrayList  must contain at least one element.

skill.text: 4.B: Describe the initial conditions that must be met for a code segment to work as intended or described.
